title: New Blood
description: Mentally and physically exhausted from his Russian adventure, once again all Scott Maclaren longed for was peace and quiet. However, a frightening health issue and a devastating personal loss soon put paid to that. It's not long before his Special Forces skills are put to the test again, as he battles new and familiar foes. Conflict, suspense and sizzling action in the bedroom are abundant as the rugged Scot does his best to keep his lady safe and satisfied.
author: A.B. McKinley
